metadata.title: CVE-2013-5724 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Phpbb3 before 3.0.11-4 for Debian GNU/Linux uses world-writable permissionsfor cache files, which allows local users to modify the file contents viastandard filesystem write operations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5724` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpbb3 - 3.0.11-5
phpbb3-l10n - 3.0.11-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpbb3 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.11-5').
